mapper.select: select tt.name as tenantName , tt.id as tenantId, count(case when tewn.type=101 then tewn.type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when tewn.type=1 then tewn.type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg tewn left join t_tenant tt on tewn.tenant_id=tt.id group by tt.id limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}
select count(1) from (select tenant_id from t_ele_warn_msg GROUP BY tenant_id) sub_ele_warn

select tewn.electricity_cabinet_id, count(case when tewn.type=101 then tewn.type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when tewn.type=1 then tewn.type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg tewn group by tewn.electricity_cabinet_id limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}
